医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究强调诊断心脏病的性别差异伦敦大学学院（UCL）研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，由于指导方针没有考虑性别和体型的自然差异，女性可能会错过潜在致命心脏病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-study-highlights-gender-differences-in-diagnosing-heart-condition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/New-study-highlights-gender-differences-in-diagnosing-heart-condition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4fbc1a9-30df-42ed-af41-6ce0dfa6afdc Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:45:48 -0500 New study highlights gender differences in diagnosing heart condition
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款支持铜杀死有害细菌作用的研究亚利桑那大学图森医学院的一名研究人员获得了美国国立卫生研究院 190 万美元的资助，以继续研究揭开铜的奥秘，特别是如何利用铜来杀死有害细菌和其他微生物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/NIH-grant-supports-study-of-coppers-role-in-killing-harmful-bacteria.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/NIH-grant-supports-study-of-coppers-role-in-killing-harmful-bacteria.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3786f3da-babc-4899-9f7d-65a24e0495e7 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:33:01 -0500 NIH grant supports study of copper's role in killing harmful bacteria
研究人员确定失语症语法时态障碍的原因一个国际研究小组，包括来自 HSE 语言和大脑中心的科学家，已经确定了失语症患者表达语法时态障碍的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Researchers-identify-causes-of-grammatical-tense-impairments-in-aphasia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Researchers-identify-causes-of-grammatical-tense-impairments-in-aphasia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41ab659b-d086-4ff7-9b62-658f3b0172a2 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:29:52 -0500 Researchers identify causes of grammatical tense impairments in aphasia
SUSA 计划旨在为医疗保健专业人员提供数字技能奥卢大学与领先学术机构、研究中心和行业利益相关者组成的联盟合作，自豪地宣布推出具有数字健康数据能力的可持续医疗保健（SUSA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/SUSA-initiative-aims-to-equip-healthcare-professionals-with-digital-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/SUSA-initiative-aims-to-equip-healthcare-professionals-with-digital-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a5233e6-0b03-45b1-99b1-efab8e7336ba Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:10:39 -0500 SUSA initiative aims to equip healthcare professionals with digital skills
药房福利经理引导 Medicare 患者使用自己的药房威尔康奈尔医学研究人员发现，药房福利管理机构 (PBM)（为美国大多数患者协商获得药品的组织）会引导患者使用自己的药房。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Pharmacy-benefit-managers-steer-Medicare-患者-to-use-their-own-pharmacies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Pharmacy-benefit-managers-steer-Medicare-患者-to-use-their-own-pharmacies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2f2c488-2cd2-47ef-8fd8-de41cfaac8c5 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:06:02 -0500 Pharmacy benefit managers steer Medicare patients to use their own pharmacies
机器学习技术可以改变长期新冠患者的医院护理在美国各地，没有一家医院是相同的。设备、人员配备、技术能力和患者群体都可能有所不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Machine-learning-technique-can-transform-hospital-care-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Machine-learning-technique-can-transform-hospital-care-for-long-COVID-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e8036d-e359-4755-afc3-b705f9e0d215 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 21:01:55 -0500 Machine learning technique can transform hospital care for long-COVID patients
红光照射可能有助于降低血栓风险匹兹堡大学医学院和 UPMC 外科医生科学家领导的一项研究显示，暴露在长波长红光下的人类和小鼠出现血栓的几率较低，而血栓可能会导致心脏病发作、肺损伤和中风。血栓形成和止血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Red-light-exposure-may-help-reduce-risk-of-blood-clots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Red-light-exposure-may-help-reduce-risk-of-blood-clots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=114e8c16-5288-40de-a97e-bb21496e7411 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:58:19 -0500 Red light exposure may help reduce risk of blood clots
人工智能可以彻底改变宫颈癌筛查和检测​宫颈癌仍然是全球女性的主要健康威胁，其中发展中国家的发病率最高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/AI-could-revolutionize-cervical-cancer-screening-and-detection.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/AI-could-revolutionize-cervical-cancer-screening-and-detection.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=11644954-0d51-4c35-8722-45517e29939b Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:56:06 -0500 AI could revolutionize cervical cancer screening and detection
双糖链蛋白聚糖和核心蛋白聚糖在骨骼健康中发挥着至关重要的作用骨组织是一种复杂的结构，由矿化胶原纤维和多种非胶原蛋白组成，包括双聚糖和核心蛋白聚糖等蛋白聚糖。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Biglycan-and-decorin-play-crucial-roles-in-bone-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Biglycan-and-decorin-play-crucial-roles-in-bone-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29209166-0cff-4a5e-bfaa-8b1d64256ff8 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:52:51 -0500 Biglycan and decorin play crucial roles in bone health
多吃纤维可以支持有益细菌的生长并防止肠道感染肠杆菌科细菌，包括肺炎克雷伯菌、志贺氏菌、大肠杆菌等，作为健康人类肠道微生物群的一部分，其含量较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Eating-more-fibre-supports-growth-of-good-bacteria-and-protects-against-gut-infections.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250110/Eating-more-fibre-supports-growth-of-good-bacteria-and-protects-against-gut-infections.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f644f478-268b-4f54-8296-bcca6ef94db1 Fri, 10 Jan 2025 20:31:45 -0500 Eating more fiber supports growth of good bacteria and protects against gut infections
